user.title: Set up the Mailgun Webhook
user.description: Are you sure you want to set up Mailgun?

abort.one_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is necessary.
abort.not_internet_accessible: Your Home Assistant instance needs to be accessible from the internet to receive Mailgun messages.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to setup [Webhooks with Mailgun]({mailgun_url}).

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST
- Content Type: application/json

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) on how to configure automations to handle incoming data.
